message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly a valuable asset that I believe you'll find extremely beneficial. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. To accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I propose an adjusted price of $13500. This offer includes some added benefits that I believe will further enhance its value for you.

I've considered your proposal, Alice, and I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget. However, I'm still looking to keep my expenses lower. Could we possibly agree on a price of $12500 for the product?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I'm glad to hear you're still considering our product. In light of your budget, I'm proposing a final offer of $13000. This price includes all the benefits of the product, and I believe it strikes a good balance between value and cost for you.
I appreciate your latest offer, Alice. While I see the value in your product, I'm aiming to stay within a tighter budget. Could we perhaps agree on a price of $12000?

I understand your financial considerations, Bob. In order to close this deal, I am willing to offer the product at $12500. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value of the product and your budget constraints.
